abstract: Mary T. Barra will testify before a House subcommittee as it investigates the response of General Motors to safety problems with the Chevy Cobalt.
snippet: Mary T. Barra will testify before a House subcommittee as it investigates the response of General Motors to safety problems with the Chevy Cobalt.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The chief executive of General Motors, Mary T. Barra, will testify before a House subcommittee on April 1, and the head of the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration may also go before the panel as it investigates the response of G.M. and the government to safety problems with the Chevy Cobalt, the subcommittee announced on Thursday.

headline.main: House Panel to Hear G.M. Chief’s Testimony
headline.print_headline: House Panel to Hear G.M. Chief’s Testimony
